channel.title: Cliffside, flashlight blurs skybox
channel.description:
Maybe it happens in other places as well, and I just don't notice it because it's rare that I need a flashlight outside. I only turned it on on accident here in any case.
Flashlight Off: [img]https://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/540686960064584629/56C5CCFA573F0949D738F56614A61B8728F35704/[/img]
Flashlight On: [img]https://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/540686960064589480/7C0FE238F0A58722D8F96919BB14DAEB8B1F02B7/[/img]

item.title: Cliffside, flashlight blurs skybox
item.dc:creator: lwf
item.description:
I noticed that strangely enough it seems the environment returns to normal when using the crossbow scope, even with the flashlight on. Maybe it could help tracking down the problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Cliffside, flashlight blurs skybox
item.dc:creator: br0f
item.description:
I’ve noticed that turning on the flashlight in any half life 2 installment will do some strange things to the colors of decals and other entities in the map. I assumed it was a feature to give a more high contrast look to dark sections, but it would be nice if someone found a way to turn this off.

Read full topic
